title: Looking for High Plat Support Duo
body:
Title. Want someone that will be on most nights, and who wants to climb up to Diamond and possibly further. Add me in game and we'll try a few games together :)

only condition is Teamspeak (or curse) is a must.

replies.body: Was 100 lp in Plat 2, just dropped down to mid Plat 3 atm. Interested in teaming up to test a few games if you like.
